creditline: Gift of David Laird and Helen Lauritzen Laird
description: flat bottom; outward-flaring sides to pointed steep shoulder; short wide neck with outward-flaring mouth opening; medium brown with dark brown diagonally stepped squares; brown ring around bottom edge and brown circle at bottom center
markings: attached to rim, on label: [Pima  Piman Family / No 21  Coiled Basket / W. J. Chamb (illegible--signature) Collection / Gila River Arizona  1911]; on underside, on sticker: [212]
title: Basket
